start: echo '🚀 Multi-Agent Background System Ready - 5 Agents: Operator | Manager | QA | Developer | Architect'

terminals.name: 🎛️ System Operator Agent
terminals.command: echo 'Starting System Operator Agent' && npm run agent:operator

terminals.name: 📋 Project Manager Agent
terminals.command: echo 'Starting Project Manager Agent' && npm run agent:manager

terminals.name: 🧪 QA Testing Agent
terminals.command: echo 'Starting QA Agent' && npm run agent:qa

terminals.name: 💻 Developer Agent
terminals.command: echo 'Starting Developer Agent' && npm run agent:developer

terminals.name: 🏗️ System Architect Agent
terminals.command: echo 'Starting System Architect Agent' && npm run agent:architect
